attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Blair
Two years ago my when my wife was diagnosed with MND she was literally given a death certificate without a date. She was made aware that as the disease progressed she would loose the ability to speak take food or liquid by mouth and slowly loose the use of her limbs but her brain would remain active throughout.  When asked if there was any hope of a cure the specialist replied that only a substantial increase in the funding for research could help so please Mr Blair commit your goverment to grant the £7.5 million needed.  It will be too late for Margaret but will give hope to others.

rejection.details:
The petition title should be a call for action, but there is also already a petition on the same matter:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MNDPetition/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
